title: [1.6.4]【ssp/smp】Zan’s Minimap Mod for Minecraft 小地图
txt_content:
本帖最后由 01186 于 2014-4-27 11:09 编辑 

小地图mod终于更新了~~
（鼓掌）~~




（楼主）今天我给大家带来的神秘产品，大家一定很期待吧？
（路人甲）我们早就知道了。。
（楼主）大家就装作不知道吧~~
（路人甲）是什么好期待啊~~
（楼主）大家看上去好期待啊，好吧我就告诉大家这是。。。。
（楼主）1.6.4的小地图~~
（路人甲）切~~迟早要发的~~
（楼主）给点面子吧~~
（楼主）大家要不要下载地址啊？
（路人甲）要！！
（楼主）下载地址不在这，呵呵
（路人甲）啊啊啊
以后就没有了。。。。。

End_xin 发表于 2013-9-25 20:40

不是，1.62的用不了，作者更新1.6.4小地图了
作者的下载说明：


Zan’s Minimap Mod for Minecraft 1.6.4/1.6.2
Posted on July 9, 2013 by Jeff         · 15 Comments
advertisement
Zan's Minimap Mod for MinecraftZan’s Minimap (also known as VoxelMap) is a modification for Minecraft 1.6.4, 1.6.2 and 1.7.1 that adds a fully functional minimap (like the ones in WoW, Guildwars) on the right corner of your screen. Zan’s Minimap is very similar to Rei’s minimap but it has some extra options for customization. It has support for square map, waypoint beacons, death marker and better rendering. Also, it gets updated quickly as soon the new Minecraft version releases.

Zan Minimap PreviewZan’s Minimap Mod Features:

Support for Aliens Motion Tracker and Retro Sun Direction mod
Better height indicator for mobs
Death Marker shows your last death location
Square shaped minimap
Graphical Menu for modifying map details.
Radar Mod for multiplayer
Additional texture packs supported
Multiple languages supported
Zan's Minimap Mod DownloadDownload Zan’s Minimap mod for Minecraft 1.6.4/1.5.2
For 1.5.2 zanMap152.zip (355 KB)

For 1.6.2 ZansMinimap1.6.2.zip (Forge)

For 1.6.4 ZansMinimap1.6.4.zip (Forge)

by MamiyaOtaru – Last updated 21st September, 2013

zan_minimap_squaremapzans_minimap_menucyzan_minimap_deathmarkerHow to install Zan’s Minimap Mod in Minecraft
Download and install latest version of Forge API or Modloader.
Download Zan’s minmap from the link above.
Go to Start Menu > Type %appdata%/.minecraft/bin and press Enter.
Open the file Minecraft.jar using archive software (WinRAR, 7zip etc.)
Open Zan’s Minimap zip file and drag and drop it’s files and folders into the Jar
Also, delete META-INF folder in Jar to avoid black-screen issues.
Launch Minecraft and check if mod is properly installed.
Tips and Warnings

Make a back-up of your Minecraft.jar before trying out this mod.
It’s recommended to install this mod on fresh copy of game.
This mod was first developed by Zaneris then Lahwran contiued its development for short time.
Related Posts
